title: Virtual Talk: Joy
hero_caption: Mikki Ferrill. Untitled, about 1970. National Docent Symposium Endowment.
short_description:
What does it feel like, look like to experience joyfulness? Join educator Allison Muscolino to celebrate the many ways art depicts and sparks moments of joy.

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.
list_description: Celebrate the many ways art depicts and sparks moments of joy.
description:
What does it feel like, look like to experience joyfulness? Join educator Allison Muscolino to celebrate the many ways art depicts and sparks moments of joy.

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
